abstract: Detroit gambler Ghazi Manni, who bribed University of Toledo basketball and football players to fix games, accepts plea deal and is sentenced to almost 6 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: A gambler who bribed players to fix the results of University of Toledo games was sentenced to nearly six years in prison.

headline.main: Detroit Man Sentenced in Fixing of College Games

snippet: A gambler who bribed players to fix the results of University of Toledo games was sentenced to nearly six years in prison.
